intro: Discover the magic of Christmas as you embark on a journey to win the heart of the boy of your dreams... A night full of charm and holiday spirit!
description:
Immerse yourself in a unique experience where every answer will not only reveal his personality but also fascinating traits tied to the magical world of Christmas.

In this exciting game, each question is designed to uncover the mysteries of the holiday season, allowing you to get to know these boys in a completely new way.


Features:

-Unlock images of the boys in a festive Christmas setting and discover their most charming traits as they embrace the holiday magic.

-As you progress, the questions will become more personal and will relate to the warm and sweet side of the celebration.

-Different endings depending on how many questions you answer and how you interpret the festive signals.

-Uncover the hidden secrets of each boy, from their Christmas dreams to their most special moments.

-Discover the secret and heartwarming question the boys will ask you at question 150, tied to their Christmas wishes.


Will you be able to uncover the secrets of Christmas and win their trust? Find out in this exciting new adventure!
